metadata.purpose: Proof-of-concept image generation to validate approach for African American middle-aged male character

scenes.title: Early Morning Light
scenes.lighting: soft gray dawn light filtering through cream curtains
scenes.camera_view: wide shot from corner of room
scenes.description: A spacious master bedroom in early morning light. A 45-year-old African American man with dark brown skin, short black hair with gray at the temples, and a short well-groomed beard lies in a king-size bed under a cream-colored duvet. His wife Denise, an African American woman with long braided hair wrapped in a silk bonnet, sleeps beside him. The wooden headboard is dark walnut. On Marcus's nightstand: a digital alarm clock showing 6:30, a smartphone charging, a water bottle, and a framed family photo. Cream curtains filter soft morning light. A ceiling fan is motionless above.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, spacious master bedroom, 45-year-old African American man with dark brown skin, short black hair with gray temples, short groomed beard, sleeping in king-size bed, cream duvet, African American woman sleeping beside him with silk bonnet, dark walnut headboard, nightstand with alarm clock and phone, cream curtains, soft gray dawn light, ceiling fan, family home atmosphere, peaceful morning
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, distorted, bad anatomy, deformed, young man, pale skin, white skin, no beard, messy room

scenes.title: Sitting Up in Bed
scenes.description: Marcus sits on the edge of the king-size bed, feet touching the beige carpet. He wears a white cotton t-shirt and gray sweatpants. His short black hair with gray temples is slightly mussed from sleep. He stretches his arms overhead, muscular frame visible through the shirt. Denise still sleeps under the cream duvet behind him, silk bonnet visible. The walnut nightstand and dresser match the headboard.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 45-year-old African American man with dark brown skin, short black hair with gray temples, short beard, muscular build, sitting on edge of king bed, wearing white t-shirt and gray sweatpants, stretching arms overhead, beige carpet, cream duvet, dark walnut furniture, wife sleeping in background, morning light, side view
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, bad anatomy, deformed, young man, pale skin, slim build, no beard

scenes.title: Opening Closet
scenes.description: Marcus opens the door to a walk-in closet. Inside, his side shows casual clothes: jeans on hangers, t-shirts, hoodies, a Chicago Bulls jacket. Below are sneakers, work boots, and dress shoes. On a high shelf, a CFD (Chicago Fire Department) uniform is visible in a garment bag. Denise's side has dresses and blouses. A full-length mirror is on the back wall.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 45-year-old African American man with dark brown skin, short black hair with gray temples, beard, opening walk-in closet door, jeans and hoodies on hangers, Chicago Bulls jacket, sneakers and boots on floor, CFD firefighter uniform in garment bag on high shelf, wife's dresses visible, full-length mirror, morning light, suburban home
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, bad anatomy, messy closet, cluttered, young man, pale skin

scenes.title: Selecting Clothes
scenes.description: Marcus reaches for a navy blue hoodie and dark jeans from the closet. His hand grips a wooden hanger. Nearby hang several t-shirts, including one with CFD logo. On the shelf above, folded sweatshirts are stacked. Running shoes and casual sneakers line the floor. The closet light illuminates the space warmly.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, African American man's hand reaching for navy blue hoodie in walk-in closet, dark jeans visible, wooden hangers, CFD logo t-shirt nearby, folded sweatshirts on shelf, running shoes and sneakers on floor, warm closet light, organized clothes, suburban home
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, messy, cluttered, disorganized

scenes.title: Clothes on Bed
scenes.description: Casual clothes laid out on the made side of the king bed: dark jeans, a navy blue hoodie, a gray t-shirt, and white athletic socks. Black and white Nike sneakers sit on the floor beside the bed. Marcus is not in frame. Denise has shifted, still sleeping. Morning light illuminates the cream duvet and laid-out clothes.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, casual outfit laid out on king bed with cream duvet, dark jeans, navy blue hoodie, gray t-shirt, white athletic socks arranged neatly, black and white Nike sneakers on beige carpet beside bed, morning sunlight, no people visible, still life, bedroom, clean and organized

scenes.title: Looking in Mirror
scenes.description: Marcus stands at the double vanity, looking at his reflection in the large mirror. His dark brown face shows a short black beard with gray specks, tired but warm brown eyes. Both hands rest on the granite countertop. His side of the sink has: electric razor, shaving cream, deodorant, a cup with toothbrush. Denise's side has skincare products and a makeup organizer. Three bright vanity lights illuminate from above.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 45-year-old African American man with dark brown skin, short black hair with gray, short beard with gray specks, standing at double vanity bathroom, hands on granite counter, looking at reflection in large mirror, three vanity lights above, electric razor and toiletries on counter, bright bathroom lighting, morning grooming
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, bad anatomy, deformed, young man, pale skin, no beard, dirty bathroom

scenes.title: Trimming Beard
scenes.description: Marcus holds an electric beard trimmer near his face, carefully trimming his short beard. The trimmer buzzes quietly. His reflection shows concentration as he shapes the beard line along his jaw. Small beard clippings fall into the sink. The bathroom light highlights the gray specks in his beard.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, close-up of 45-year-old African American man with dark brown skin, short black beard with gray specks, using electric beard trimmer, concentration expression, reflection in bathroom mirror, small clippings falling into sink, bright vanity light, grooming routine

scenes.title: Brushing Teeth
scenes.description: Marcus brushes his teeth with the electric toothbrush, the device humming. White foam is visible around his lips. His reflection shows the brushing motion. His left hand rests on the counter. Morning bathroom routine.

scenes.title: In the Shower
scenes.description: Through the foggy glass shower door, Marcus's silhouette is visible under the rainfall shower spray. Steam fills the shower enclosure. Water streams down the glass. The shower tiles are light gray.

scenes.description: Marcus steps out of the shower onto a beige bath mat, one foot out, water dripping from his body. He reaches for a large beige towel on the chrome towel bar. Steam escapes from the open shower door. The bathroom mirror is fogged.

scenes.title: Greeting Son
scenes.description: Marcus clasps Jaylen's shoulder in a warm father-son greeting. Jaylen looks up from his phone and cereal bowl, smiling. Jaylen wears a hoodie with Lincoln High School on it. The cereal box (Frosted Flakes) sits on the counter. A glass of orange juice is beside the bowl.

scenes.description: Marcus opens the large stainless steel refrigerator door. Inside: eggs on the door shelf, milk carton, orange juice pitcher, lunch meats, vegetables in crisper drawers, condiments on the door. Cold air and light spill out. Marcus reaches for the egg carton.

scenes.title: Cracking Eggs
scenes.description: Close-up of Marcus's dark brown hands cracking an egg on the edge of the skillet. The egg shell splits, and the yolk and white fall into the hot pan with a sizzle. Shell pieces are held in his hands. The pan already has one egg cooking.

scenes.title: Toast Popping Up
scenes.description: Toast pops up from the stainless steel toaster, golden brown and crispy. Steam rises from the hot bread. The toaster's chrome surface reflects the kitchen lights. The butter dish and jam jar sit ready beside it.

scenes.title: Family at Breakfast
scenes.description: The family around the kitchen island: Marcus sits on a barstool eating eggs and toast, Kayla beside him with the same meal, Denise stands sipping coffee and eating toast quickly (she's running late). Jaylen grabs an apple from a fruit bowl, backpack on. Morning family scene, everyone in motion.
